title: Health and Social Sciences | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Our courses encompass topics such as Elder Health and Rehabilitation, Occupational Therapy, Physiotherapy and Sonography.

text_lines: Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Keep abreast of advances in health and social sciences – and make a difference in the lives of others.

Learn the technologies and techniques behind allied health services. Discover how breakthroughs in therapy can improve the prognosis and quality of treatment for patients. And learn about the emerging field of preventive care, where dietetics, nutrition and diagnostics play important roles.

"I really enjoyed the course! I'm able to better appreciate the work of the radiographers and films, and to identify normal and abnormal X-rays. This helps me to understand the clinical reasoning of doctors (e.g., orders for certain splints or exercise regimes) as well as to hypothesise reasons for patient's clinical presentation."
Attended Upper Limb Plain Film Radiography for Occupational Therapists
This course is designed to equip AHP clinical supervisors and educators with the skills to provide effective clinical training to AHPs and students.
Adult and Geriatric Rehabilitation, Health Sciences
This course equips occupational therapists with skills in occupational therapy-centric cognitive-perceptual assessments, problem identification, goal setting, and intervention plans.
Health Sciences, Adult and Geriatric Rehabilitation, Occupational Therapy
Functional Fitness Screening and Falls Efficacy Prescription for Older Adults
This course equips learners to help older adults maintain fitness, manage fall risks, and improve independence and well-being.
This course is a collaboration with Tan Tock Seng Hospital. It aims to equip participants with core competencies of RTWCs to assess and facilitate the early RTW of ill or injured workers.
Qualifying Examination for Physiotherapists, Occupational Therapists, and Diagnostic Radiographers
This qualifying exam certifies Physiotherapists, Occupational Therapists, and Diagnostic Radiographers seeking AHPC registration to practise in Singapore.
Sonography, Occupational Therapy, Physiotherapy, Health Sciences
Clinical Reasoning in Assessment and Therapy Planning for Older Persons with Dysphagia - Basic
Learn and develop skills in advanced clinical reasoning, assessment, and treatment of swallowing issues in older persons.
Shedding Light on Workplace Safety in Social Services
These niche courses equip professionals in social service agencies with the skills to optimise health and safety at the workplace.
Health Sciences, Social Sciences, Workplace Safety and Health
Armed with a Postgraduate Diploma in Sonography, Florence Tan is ready for advanced clinical practice and leadership.
With the ageing population in Singapore, there has been a paradigm shift from structured institutionalised care to a more person-centric approach.
Health Sciences, Adult and Geriatric Rehabilitation, Design Innovation
As Singapore's ageing population continues to grow, care for the elderly is becoming a pressing issue.
Health Sciences, Adult and Geriatric Rehabilitation
Mobility, Balance & Falls in Older Adults: Symposium

With an average life expectancy of 83 in 2015, Singapore has the third-highest life expectancy in the world. For healthcare providers, an ageing population is associated with many issues, among which are falls in older persons.
Health Sciences, Adult and Geriatric Rehabilitation

Exciting news! We are introducing new micro-credentials in Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Be among the first to know by registering your interest today!

Health and Social Sciences
Keep abreast of advances in health and social sciences – and make a difference in the lives of others.
Learn the technologies and techniques behind allied health services. Discover how breakthroughs in therapy can improve the prognosis and quality of treatment for patients. And learn about the emerging field of preventive care, where dietetics, nutrition and diagnostics play important roles.
"I really enjoyed the course! I'm able to better appreciate the work of the radiographers and films, and to identify normal and abnormal X-rays. This helps me to understand the clinical reasoning of doctors (e.g., orders for certain splints or exercise regimes) as well as to hypothesise reasons for patient's clinical presentation."
Chong Tjia-Yih Judith

updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");

    function updateCheckboxVal(attrName) {
        if (attrName) {
            var checkboxName = attrName + "_checkbox";
            var intAttr = document.getElementsByName(attrName);
            var intCheckbox = document.getElementsByName(checkboxName);
            if (intCheckbox && intAttr) {
                intAttr[0].value = intCheckbox[0].checked;
            }
        }
    }

    function updatesUponSubmit() {
        var checkboxes = document.querySelectorAll('[data-group="check-box-group"]');
        var boxSelected = false;
        for (var i = 0, l = checkboxes.length; i < l; i++) {
            if (checkboxes[i].checked) {
                boxSelected = true;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (boxSelected) {
            var gmt8Date = new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-US", { timeZone: "Asia/Singapore" });
            const now = new Date().toUTCString();
            var optinEmailDate = document.getElementsByName("OptinEmailDate");
            var createdDate = document.getElementsByName("CreatedDate");
            var formSubmissionDate = document.getElementsByName("FormSubmissionDate");
            var primaryKey = document.getElementsByName("PrimaryKey");
            var getEmail = document.getElementById("email").value;
            var getWebsource = document.getElementById("websourceID").value;

            optinEmailDate[0].value = now;
            createdDate[0].value = now;
            formSubmissionDate[0].value = now;
            primaryKey[0].value = getEmail + getWebsource + gmt8Date;
			
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");
			
        } else {
            var checkboxes = document.querySelector('.error-message');
            checkboxes.classList.add('active');
            return false;
        }
    }
